EmailTemplate.name: 17.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.L.G.N.17206.AirScale 2017.Email 3 - Zero Emission
EmailTemplate.subject: Break the link between rising traffic and energy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Zero-carbon vision is a business opportunity Target zero emissions? Here’s why As your radio network handles more traffic, its energy costs will rise.
No, it doesn’t have to be this way.
There are many innovations you can deploy to deliver more mobile broadband while reducing your network’s energy use. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
